data.meta_description: Are you looking for help with Big Truck Pups: Rubble X-Treme Truck for Paw Patrol?
data.text:
How do I connect the tools to the crane?

To connect the tools to the crane, please see the steps below: Press the ball end of the tool into the slot under the crane piece. Please no...

How do I re-attach the rear container of my Rubble X-Treme Truck?

To re-attach the rear container, press the slots on the rear container firmly into the bumps on the back of the trailer.

How do I reconnect the trailer to the front cab?

To reconnect the trailer to the front cab, press the grey connector on the trailer firmly into the slot on the front cab.

How do I change the batteries of my Rubble X-Treme Truck?

To change the batteries of the Rubble X-Treme Truck, please follow the steps below: Lift up the roof of the front cab to access the battery ...

The hook does not connect to the crane. What do I do?

Please ensure that the tab on the hook is aligned with the slot on the crane. The hook will only connect when facing towards the vehicle.

How do I store the tools of my Rubble's X-Treme Truck so I can close up the rear container?

For storing your tools in the trailer, please follow these steps:Please ensure that the crane is lowered, and rotated back into its initial ...
